title: The Cobbler
short_plot_summary: A cobbler discovers a magical stitching machine that allows him to step into the lives of his customers by wearing their shoes. As he experiences their lives, he learns the importance of his own.
explanation: A shoe, representing the cobbler's profession and the shoes he fixes
A hammer, symbolizing the tools the cobbler uses to repair shoes
A sparkle, indicating the magical nature of the stitching machine
A walking man, representing the main character stepping into the lives of his customers by wearing their shoes
Silhouettes of people, symbolizing the various lives and identities the cobbler experiences through wearing the shoes
